trans-unit.source: Specifies where a chart element, such as a legend or title, will be docked on the chart.
trans-unit.target: 指定图表元素（如图例或标题）在图表中的停靠位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking> enumeration represents the docking location on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control that an chart element should be docked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking>枚举上表示的停靠位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控件应该停靠的图表元素。

trans-unit.source: Set the `IsDockedInsideChartArea` property of the relevant chart element to specify whether that element will be docked to the entire chart image or to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object.
trans-unit.target: 设置`IsDockedInsideChartArea`要指定是否将为整个图表图像或设置为停靠该元素的相关图表元素的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>对象。

trans-unit.source: The chart area is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Title.DockedToChartArea> property of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 中指定图表区<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Title.DockedToChartArea>图表元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: Docked to the bottom of either the chart image or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 停靠在图表图像或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 对象的底部。

trans-unit.source: Docked to the left of either the chart image or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 停靠在图表图像或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 对象的左侧。

trans-unit.source: Docked to the right of either the chart image or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 停靠在图表图像或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 对象的右侧。

trans-unit.source: Docked to the top of either the chart image or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 停靠在图表图像或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 对象的顶部。
